## Two background sources
- The Enron-Spam dataset ( http://nlp.cs.aueb.gr/software_and_datasets/Enron-Spam/ )
- Amazon Reviews ( https://www.kaggle.com/kritanjalijain/amazon-reviews/metadata )

## Two potential hypotheses
- The email can be classified as spam or otherwise using text classification and languagae analysis
- The 1-5 star rating on an Amazon product review can be predicted from the text of the review
